title: Turning Data into Knowledge, Knowledge into Action, and Action into Impact.
text:
Welcome! I am Stefano Grassi and I am a Data Scientist, Applied Econometrician, and Independent Researcher based in vibrant Bangkok, Thailand. My work focuses on statistical modeling, time series forecasting, financial modeling, machine learning, natural language processing, and AI research.









Passionate about solving real-world problems, I integrate STEM and social sciences to analyze economic, social, and business challenges. Through data-driven insights, I strive to support Thailand’s economic growth and broader global innovation.





Let’s Connect!
